response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $12,000 value to you. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,800 for you. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a discounted price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
